main event: A UFO sighting in Miamisburg, Ohio on April 29, 1964, where an observer noted a bright light changing brightness while remaining stationary.
interesting points: The object was described as stationary at a 45-degree elevation,It exhibited characteristics similar to that of an astro-body such as Venus,The sighting lasted between 15 to 20 minutes,The object was reported by a civilian observer,The document noted a complete lack of positive identification due to omitted azimuth details.
sighted object: a light brighter than a searchlight
